awd_titl_txt: SGER: Clear Sky Monitor for Ground Based Optical Aeronomy
awd_abstract_narration: This grant supports the development and testing of a novel                 optical instrument for determining night sky clarity. A                         modulated Ronchi grating will provide a modulated output that is                sensitive to sky clarity when  a wide field of stars is observed.               This output can be used to determine whether the sky is                         sufficiently clear to conduct observations of faint night sky                   emission lines. It is expected that this instrument will be                     especially useful for operations from remote sites, or from sites               operated by personnel inexperienced in judging whether conditions               are suitable for observations. Reproduction of the developed                    instrument is expected to be inexpensive, and its widespread                    application is foreseen.
org_div_long_name: Division of Atmospheric and Geospace Sciences
